keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.NoiseFilters.ANR

Class ConjGradNN

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.NoiseFilters.ANR.ConjGradNN

  • public class ConjGradNN
extends java.lang.Object

     Optimized Classificator/Model by Conjugated Gradient.
 Also this class is a container for a perceptron neural network and implements the training methods:
  * Conjugated Gradient: conjugatedGradient.
  * Descendent Gradient: descentGradient.
  
  
                  Input-Layer   Hidden Layer-i x nLayers    Output-Layer
                            -
                           | I            H                                                     
                           | I                    H                                                       - 
                           | I                    H                                                     O  |
        nInputs    | I                    H                                                     O  | nOutputs 
                           | I                    H                                                     O  |
                           | I                    H                                                     O  |
                           | I                    H                                                       -
                           | I                    H                                                     
                            -

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Luciano SÃ¡nchez (University of Oviedo) 27/02/2004, Modified by Enrique A. de la Cal (University of Oviedo) 13/12/2008

        Parameters:
        vNelement - topology. Number of neurons by hidden layer.
        vInput - input examples.
        vOutput - expected outputs.
        pr - Random generator.

      • f_denormalized

        public double f_denormalized(double[][][] x,
                             double[] FACTOR)

        Returns the denormalized mean square error of a perceptron with weights x for all the examples Input

        Parameters:
        x - the example to give the perceptron.
        FACTOR - a vector with difference between the max and min value for each output
        Returns:
        the denormalized mean square error of the perceptron x output respect the expected output Output

      • conjugatedGradient

        public double conjugatedGradient(FUN f,
                                 double TOL_ERR,
                                 double MIN_DELTAGC,
                                 int MAX_ITER)

        Returns the mean square error of the output perceptron calculated with Conjugated Gradient training algorithm.

        Parameters:
        f - the error function.
        TOL_ERR - the stop error.
        MIN_DELTAGC - is not used.
        MAX_ITER - number of maximum iteratations.
        Returns:
        the mean square error of the output perceptron calculated with Conjugated Gradient training algorithm.

      • descentGradient

        Returns the mean square error of the output perceptron calculated with Descendent Gradient training algorithm.

        Parameters:

        TOL_ERR - the stop error.
        MIN_DELTAGC - is not used.
        MAX_ITER - number of maximum iteratations.
        Returns:
        the mean square error of the output perceptron calculated with Descendent Gradient training algorithm.
